name: Tunes Attack ! Lite (for iPad)
description:
> BEAT ALL YOUR TUNES! <
You like Rhythm Games, but you’re fed up with buying a new game to play on a new album?
Play Tunes Attack!

> UNLIMITED PLAYLIST <
Play with your Own Music! Games are Generated by Your Music in Real-Time, you can play with Any Song!

> 3 RHYTHM GAMES IN 1 <
Play the Classic Rhythm game (TAP TAP like), but also a Scooter DRIVING game, and a Space SHOOTER! Of course all in rhythm with your music!

> ONLINE SCOREBOARD <
Perform all the most popular worldwide hits and challenge the WORLD, on each song and each game!

> AMAZING STORYLINE <
Save the world from Tunes Attack in the Career Mode designed with graphic novel, and defeat the FINAL BOSS!

> 2 PLAYERS MODE <
Challenge your friends on the same device!

> Multi-Lingual
- English
- Français
- 日本語

> Other Features
- High 3D graphics and sound quality
- Dynamic lighting and physics
- Facebook connection
- Easy music transfer through Wi-Fi

> Available in the Lite Version
- The 3 Gameplays
- First chapter of Career Mode
- Online Scores
- 4 Eclectic Sound Tracks
- 1 Track Upload
